playn.core
Class TextFormat

java.lang.Object
  playn.core.TextFormat

public class TextFormat
extends Object

Contains configuration for laying out and drawing single- or multi-line text to a Canvas.

Nested Class Summary
static class TextFormat.Alignment
          Used to align multiline text.
 
Field Summary
 TextFormat.Alignment align
          The alignment to use for multiline text.
 Font font
          The font in which to render the text (or null which indicates that the default font should be used).
 float wrapWidth
          The width at which to wrap lines of text (or Float.MAX_VALUE if the text should not be wrapped.
 
Constructor Summary
TextFormat()
          Creates a default text format instance.
TextFormat(Font font, float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align)
          Creates a configured text format instance.
 
Method Summary
 boolean shouldWrap()
          Returns true if line wrapping is desired.
 String toString()
           
 TextFormat withAlignment(TextFormat.Alignment align)
          Returns a clone of this text format with the alignment configured as specified.
 TextFormat withFont(Font font)
          Returns a clone of this text format with the font configured as specified.
 TextFormat withWrapping(float wrapWidth, TextFormat.Alignment align)
          Returns a clone of this text format with the wrap width and alignment configured as specified.
 TextFormat withWrapWidth(float wrapWidth)
          Returns a clone of this text format with the wrap width configured as specified.
